NPC.name: warrior
NPC.description: The shapely green skinned humanoid is alert. Her eyes roving, her body clad in a crude armoured jacket of wooden slats over cloth. The armed and pointy eared village denizen looks ready for trouble, one hand resting on her belt as she keeps a wary eye on you.
